text:
Paloma Delia Margarita Cordero Tapia (1 July 1937 – 11 May 2020) was a Mexican socialite. She was the First Lady of Mexico from 1 December 1982 to 30 November 1988. Her husband was President Miguel de la Madrid. Cordero was born in Mexico City. During the same time when she was First Lady, Cordero was President of the National System for Integral Family Development.
Cordero died on 11 May 2020 in Mexico City, aged 82.

annotations.surface_form: National System for Integral Family Development
